doc.field: Record Group 3. Fieldston School (1925-2012; 18.75 linear feet)
Record Group 3. Fieldston School (1925-2012; 18.75 linear feet)

From the administrations of principals Spencer Brown, Kenneth Barton, and Ellen Stern, as well as administrator David Schwartz. Files: Academic honesty, Administration, Administrative structure, Business office, Calendars, Cheating, Comparative Study [of revenue], Dewitt-Wallace Reader's Digest Fund, Diversity, Drug education, Education Records Bureau testing (2 folders), Faculty memos, Form lists, High school mailings, History department, Independent Schools Opportunity Project, Lunch, Middle school, Minority experiences at Fieldston, New York State Pupil Evaluation, Nemerov dinner, Albert G. Oliver program, Open School Evening, Planning Committee, Professional development, Questionnaire - midwinter vacation, Report on morale, Science Department, Student discipline, Student leadership conference, Study halls (Black and Latin-American Students Club), Sit-in, Suspensions, Trips.
Record Group 3. Fieldston School (1925-2012; 18.75 linear feet)
